arts.ttl: Holstein Kiel head coach Marcel Rapp speaks on odd piece of Bundesliga history
arts.sum: Holstein Kiel head coach Marcel Rapp made a piece of Bundesliga history on Saturday afternoon, albeit not in the most positive way. By deciding to pull the trigger on a…

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen engage in debate over “dream goals” from Marvin Ducksch and Felix Agu
arts.sum: SV Werder Bremen striker Marvin Ducksch had to engage in some verbal gymnastics during his post-match interview on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen cruise to victory over struggling Holstein Kiel
arts.sum: Marvin Ducksch put Bremen on their way to victory with a superb free-kick from an angle many wouldn't have dared to shoot from. Werder Bremen got back to winning ways with a convincing 3-0 win over struggling Holstein Kiel on Matchday 27.
We can leak the first full image of the Werder Bremen 2025-26 home kit.

arts.ttl: Holstein Kiel vs Werder Bremen preview: Hosts looking for second home win
arts.sum: Holstein Kiel sit bottom of the table looking for a win at home against Werder Bremen to close the gap towards Bochum in 16th. The away side look to continue where they left off during their last away game against Leverkusen.

arts.ttl: Preview: Holstein Kiel vs. Werder Bremen - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Holstein Kiel and Werder Bremen, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Bremen unlikely to sign Andre Silva on a permanent deal
arts.sum: The man who once scored 28 goals for Eintracht Frankfurt during the 2020-21 Bundesliga campaign, hasn't hit the ground running for Bremen thus far.
